Title: Silverlight motion detection
Description: Motion detection using Silverlight 4 camera support and a simple motion detection algorithm.
HomeWiki:
Silverlight motion detection

Motion detection using Silverlight 4 camera support and a simple motion detection algorithm.
  • View a demo of the application
  • Read an article about how this application works



The project contains:
  • A simple motion detection library.
  • A Silverlight 4 application using the above library.
  • A web page for testing the Silverlight application.

Contact me if you want to contribute in this project by providing algorithms or any other staff.
